definitions.text: one who works hard at boring tasks
a politician who belongs to a small clique that controls a political party for private rather than public ends
a tool (as a hoe or pick or mattock) used for breaking up the surface of the soil
a car driven by a person whose job is to take passengers where they want to go in exchange for money
a saddle horse used for transportation rather than sport etc.
be able to manage or manage successfully
examples: she could not cut the long days in the office
he hacked his way through the forest

definitions.text: fix a computer program piecemeal until it works
examples: I'm not very good at hacking but I'll give it my best
The patient with emphysema is hacking all day
